name: Ch.10ABaseConvo5
_source: speak;Tana;Father Moulder...|Do you miss Frelia as much as I do?
speak;Moulder;The sea winds of our homeland are not easily forgotten, Princess.
speak;Tana;I can almost smell the salt from our coastline...|The morning mists over Castle Frelia.
speak;Moulder;Our kingdom may be far, but our hearts remain close to home.
speak;Tana;I wonder how my brother Innes is managing...|*sniff*|He must be worried about our people.
speak;Moulder;Prince Innes is strong.|He understands our duty extends beyond our shores.
speak;Tana;And Princess Eirika needs us now.|Our friendship means more than our homesickness.
speak;Moulder;Precisely.|The bonds of friendship transcend borders.
speak;Tana;Sometimes I dream of the lighthouse at Frelia's southern coast...|The way the waves crash against the rocks.
speak;Moulder;*chuckles*|Your imagination is as vivid as ever, Princess.
speak;Tana;But we're making a difference here!|Helping our friends is more important than missing home.
speak;Moulder;Your spirit gives me hope.|Princess Eirika is fortunate to have such loyal allies.
